sentences.sentence: Try the aptly-named Oink to reduce the memory usage of your Rails application.
sentences.translation: 尝试使用名称恰当的 Oink 来减少 Rails 应用程序的内存使用。

sentences.sentence: With an oink oink here and an oink oink there, four weaned pigs seemed to have scared seagulls away from a duck hunting club.
sentences.translation: 这里呼噜呼噜，那里呼噜呼噜，四只断奶的小猪似乎把海鸥从猎鸭俱乐部吓跑了。

sentences.sentence: Pigs on the bus sing. Oink! Oink! Oink!
sentences.translation: 猪在公共汽车上唱歌。唝！唝！唝！
